profile.name: Jeremy Evans
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Ubicloud, Inc.
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with expertise in database development, web development, and library packaging. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including Sequel and Roda.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable web applications.
Improved code quality and performance through rigorous testing and refactoring.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries.
Utilized expertise in database development and web development to deliver high-quality projects on time.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of popular open-source projects, including Sequel and Roda.
Participated in code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices.

experience.title: Ruby Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients using Ruby on Rails.
Utilized expertise in database development and web development to deliver high-quality projects on time.
